articles.content: A new method for scanning telescope images for the faintest signs of rock far beyond Pluto has uncovered evidence that our Solar System's disc of material extends far further into interstellar space … [+3706 chars]

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: China Aims to Grow Influence in Space with ‘Tiangong’ Station - VOA Learning English
articles.description: China recently expanded its estimate for the service life of its Tiangong space station. The country has repeatedly said it wants to expand its influence in space.
articles.content:
China plans to increase the size of its space station in the coming years.
The station will offer astronauts from other countries a different choice for near-Earth missions. The International Space … [+2884 chars]
